      • help

        private static void help(boolean isHelpRequested)

        Prints a hepl message and exits. The exit code is 0, if called with --help. Otherwise the parameters are regarded as erroneous and the exit code is 1.

        Parameters:
        isHelpRequested - true, if called with --help on the command line
